title: Vogue unveils poet Amanda Gorman as new cover star
description: Poet Amanda Gorman has another accolade to her name: She's the first poet to be featured on a cover for Vogue.

title: Meet the trailblazing Black woman scientist behind a Covid-19 vaccine
description: 34-year-old Kizzmekia Corbett is a key developer behind the Moderna vaccine. She tells CNN's Abby Phillip about her life in science, preparing for the next pandemic and the importance of empathy when it comes to tackling vaccine hesitancy in the Black community.

title: 'Mom' star speaks out about not having kids in real life
description: Actress Allison Janney shared her thoughts on not having children during an interview on "The Drew Barrymore Show."

title: 95-year-old credits Frank Sinatra tune for beating 'dreaded' Covid-19
description: James Ingargiola, a 95-year-old World War II veteran, spoke to CNN affiliate WBZ about how music helped him find the will to overcome Covid-19.

title: Why some Asian Americans are embracing their heritage by dropping their anglicized names
description: Tshab Her grew up feeling like she lived a double life.

title: Car ferries in the skies: The rise and fall of the Aviation Traders Carvair
description: If an aviation enthusiast were to compile a roster of the world's weirdest looking planes, the ATL-98 Carvair would definitely merit a place of honor.
